channel.title: Basics on footgolf collective
channel.description: Recent content in Basics on footgolf collective

item.title: 5 Footgolf Essentials to Bring Along
item.description: Origin story It’s the night before tournament day, bags are being double and triple checked to make sure nothing is forgotten. In no particular order, I’ve came up with a list of 5 things you may not want to forget to throw in your bag before heading out to the course on tournament day. Ball Marker A custom poker chip, golf marker, or quarter can be used to mark your ball which must be done when it stops on the green.

item.title: Uniform of The Sport
item.description: Origin story Basketball, soccer, and football all are sports with uniforms, right? FootGolf is not a bit different. The only thing is you get to customize the jersey you wear, however you’d like. Instead of your coach forcing you to pick between #98 or #89 because they are the only two left in the gym closet. We call it the “dress code” but to be quite frank, it is no different than a personalized uniform.
